MATURITY_DESC: TESTES VERY SMALL, STRING-LIKE AND SOMEWHAT TRANSLUCENT OR PINKISH IN COLOUR
TESTES ENLARGING, A DISTINCT BULGE EVIDENT BUT STILL TRANSLUCENT OR PINKISH IN COLOUR
TESTES ENLARGING, BROWN-WHITE OR WHITE IN COLOUR, FIRM IN TEXTURE
TESTES LARGE, WHITE AND EASILY BROKEN. NO SPERM EVIDENT
TESTES LARGE, WHITE AND SPERM EVIDENT
TESTES FLACCID, SHRUNKEN AND YELLOW-BROWN IN COLOUR. SPERM DUCTS ENLARGED AND A SMALL AMOUNT OF SPRM MAY BE PRESENT
TESTES FIRM, SMALL AND YELLOW-BROWN IN COLOUR.  SPERM DUCTS SMALL
OVARIES VERY SMALL, TRANSLUCENT OR PINKISH  AND SOMEWHAT GELATINOUS IN TEXTURE
OVARIES RELATIVELY SMALL, PINKISH-YELLOW OR CREAM IN COLOUR, GRANULAR IN TEXTURE.  NO DISTINCT EGGS VISIBLE
OVARIES LARGE, CREAM OR YELLOW IN COLOUR CONTAINING OPAQUE EGGS THAT CAN BE DISTINGUISED BY DIRECT OBSERVATION.  SEX MAY BE DETERMINED EXTERNALLY
OVARIES CONTAINING PARTLY OR WHOLLY TRANSLUCENT EGGS.  SEX EASILY DETERMINED EXTERNALLY
OVARIES CONTAINING ENTIRELY TRANSLUCENT, MATURE OVA.  EGGS LOOSE AND WILL RUN FROM OVIDUCTS UNDER SLIGHT PRESSURE
OVARIES LARGE, FLACCID AND PURPLE IN COLOUR; A FEW TRANSLUCENT EGGS MAY BE LEFT.  OVARIAN MEMBRANE VERY VASCULAR (BLOODSHOT) AND SAC-LIKE
OVARIES CONTRACTED AND FIRM, PINKISH GREY TO CREAM-YELLOW IN COLOUR AND MAY APPEAR GRANULAR IN TEXTURE BUT NO DISTINCT EGGS ARE VISIBLE
